title: Store - Android library for effortless, reactive data loading
description: Store is an Android library for effortless, reactive data loading.Store provides a level of abstraction between UI elements and data operations.

title: Native apps in C#: Xamarin
description: Taking a look at what Xamarin offers to you as development framework in comparison to React Native and pure native development. Looking up for potential gains and drawbacks, clarifying the difference between Xamarin.Forms and Xamarin.Native

title: Android App Shortcuts
description: A deep dive in android app shortcuts.

title: Team Dynamics and Group Decision Making
description: An overview of how interpersonal interactions and dynamics impact team effectiveness and efficiency. We'll look at workplace styles, decision making methods and how to avoid barriers to good decision making within the lens of product teams.

title: Animation: A Hibbett Case Study
description: Learning about Android Animation with 4 case studies.

title: Building Compassionate Software
description: We're going to take a look at psychological safety and how it can help your team perform better. My goal is to give you the evidence you need to take back to your team so we can all improve our workplaces â€“ with enough of us, we can begin to make significant change in our industry and beyond.
